column1: echo ¦export¦VERSION=$(php -r "echo PHP_MAJOR_VERSION.PHP_MINOR_VERSION;") && curl -A "Docker" -o /tmp/blackfire-probe.tar.gz -D - -L -s https://blackfire.io/api/v1/releases/probe/php/linux/amd64/${VERSION} && tar zxpf /tmp/blackfire-probe.tar.g... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦set¦-ex && if [ $USE_XDEBUG = "yes" ]; then pecl install xdebug && docker-php-ext-enable xdebug; echo "xdebug.remote_enable=on" >> /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/xdebug.ini; echo "xdebug.remote_autostart=1" >> /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/xdebug.i... :: Filesystem_operation
